0: The staff were very friendly professional and helpful gave us good restaurant recommendations too
We looked at many Hotels with high star ratings and Ovolo easily stood out from them all
We had a couple of glasses of nice Australian wine while checking in and made friends with a New Zealand couple at the bar
We enjoyed the happy hour at the hotel lobby in the afternoons
Loved all the included free stuff
The amenities were fantastic from the happy hour in the Lo Lounge to the complimentary stocked mini bar Carlsberg and coconut water were both life savers
Great service great location easy and convenient
Hotel was very stylish and comfortable
Location was spot on for clubs bars and lovely restaurants
1: 15 minutes walk to Central 20 minutes to Star Ferry
We had a Super Shiny Room which for Hong Kong we found the room size to be large
However during my stay it coincided with their upgrading

I also promoted Ovolo to my friends and encouraged my 3 friends to stay in Ovolo too Douglas Campbell 2x rooms and Michael Barufi 1x room and they were also extremely unhappy with the construction noise
Had I known this in advance I would have selected a different hotel
but we feel we have had very poor value for money
The layout of the room and the size
Even prices have changed ovolo is a great chain hotel will not be unpleased clean free drinks and breakfast urbain home away home
Room was ok but had some very weird design features
2: The manager was supposed not to be in the building until we complained again and she finally showed up in fact it was the person seating just near by the front desk at check out
The breakfast at central was the worst we ’ve had in a hotel too
No umbrella minimal bathroom Minimal alcohol offering and minimum space for patrons
A writing table comes useful for those who need to do some work
Unfortunately we do not rememeber their names they were the team that took over reception from beginning of the afternoon until 10 pm
Some water white stain left on the washroom glass door clip
Blackout blinds for a sleep in or afternoon nap
it is a great hotel if you improve the speed if the service and the noise cancellation in the room you will be the best in town
the hotel has a very home like feel that feels more like your own personal flat vs a hotel
